data.oai_dc:dc: SQLITE database of LASTZ matches (from turtles-lastz-matches-to-reptiles.tar.bz2) between assembled contigs in turtle-contigs-enriched-from-taxa.fasta and the UCE probes in turtles-all-probes.fasta. This database is used to construct data sets containing loci that are shared across taxa and prep data for alignment.
